description: 'The Crotch Watcher'(Part 1b) - Dressed and ready for work Gordon Grant drives his convertible to the Transamerica Building where he stations himself on a toilet inside the men's room - the 'action' john at his office - jerking his large cock in unison with the guy in the next stall. title: The Crotch Watcher, Scene #03
